meanings.definition: A device used for cooking food.
meanings.sent1: My mom uses the cooker to make delicious meals every day.
meanings.sent2: The cooker in the kitchen helps us prepare our meals quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cooker decided to take a break and let us order pizza instead.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for cooking turned her into a skilled cooker in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The cooker hummed happily as it boiled water for pasta.

meanings.sent1: The cooker at the restaurant always greets us with a smile.
meanings.sent2: My grandma is the best cooker in our family.
meanings.sent3: The cooker joked that the secret ingredient was love, but we knew it was just garlic.
meanings.sent4: She is a fast cooker, whipping up meals in no time.
meanings.sent5: The cooker's apron was always stained with the colors of various spices.

meanings.definition: A pot or pan used for cooking.
meanings.sent1: The cooker on the stove is heating up for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new cooker because this one is too small.
meanings.sent3: The cooker on the shelf felt lonely without any ingredients inside.
meanings.sent4: The old cooker had seen many meals and still looked brand new.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cooker gleamed under the kitchen lights.
